ingredients.ingredient: 1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, chopped

cookingTips: Mince garlic finely or use a food processor for even distribution
Marinated artichokes add flavor, so drain them well before chopping
Bake at 350Â°F for 15-20 minutes until edges are golden and dip is heated through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simple four-ingredient dip. Do you prefer to chop by hand or use a food processor, and are you comfortable managing oven temperature?
